params.basePay: Salary amount in token's smallest unit

params.period: Period identifier (e.g., timestamp or yyyymm format)
params.token: Token to use for payment (USDC or EURC)

params.employeeIndex: Index of employee in company's employee array
Index of employee in company's employee array

addEmployee(uint256,address,uint256,addr.notice: Add an employee to a company

createPayrollBatch(uint256,uint256,addre.notice: Create a payroll batch for a company

executePayroll(uint256).notice: Execute payroll batch - transfer tokens to employees

getBatchPayments(uint256).notice: Get payment records for a batch

getCompanyEmployees(uint256).notice: Get all employees for a company

getEmployeeCount(uint256).notice: Get employee count for a company

getEmployeePayments(address).notice: Get payment records for an employee
